refresh.description: Refreshes centering of modal on page

attach-show.description: Attach show event to another element

attach-hide.description: Attach hide event to another element

attach-toggle.description: Attach toggle event to another element

attach-refresh.description: Attach refresh event to another element

closable.description: Setting to false will not allow you to close the modal by clicking on the dimmer.

transition.description: Named transition to use when animating menu in and out, full list can be found in ui transitions docs.

allow-multiple.description: Allow second modal to be opened on top of the first modal.

autofocus.description: First input in modal will receive focus when shown.
